examples.example: 我希望能够准确地表达自己内心的想法和感受。

translate.english: I hope to be able to accurately express my inner thoughts and feelings.

examples.example: 我会勇敢地表达自己的观点，让别人更好地了解我。

translate.english: I will bravely express my own views to make others better understand me.

examples.example: 我们应该善于运用合适的方式来表达自己对他人的感激之情。

translate.english: We should be good at using appropriate ways to express our gratitude to others.
